sentences.en: But it was really fun to reminisce with everyone.
sentences.cn: 但和大家一起回忆往事确实很有趣.

sentences.en: Drink a glass of wine, coffee, or tea, read a good book, or watch a good movie. Look at old photographs and reminisce.
sentences.cn: 喝上一杯酒，咖啡或茶，然后读本好书，或看场精彩的电影，也可以翻翻老照片，回忆过去。

sentences.en: Grandfather likes to reminisce with other old people after supper.
sentences.cn: 爷爷喜欢饭后跟几位老人叙旧.

sentences.en: It is something we can show off, or keep around for a rainy day to either entertain ourselves, work on, or reminisce what you were thinking that day when you wrote it.
sentences.cn: 诗歌可以用来炫耀，也可以伴随左右以备不时之需——不论是为了自娱自乐，还是为了回忆你写诗时在想些什么，或者是为了接着那时的想法继续思考。

sentences.en: Jou - chia loved hearing her reminisce, so Jou - chia became the sole recipient of her affection.
sentences.cn: 柔嘉最喜欢听她的回忆, 所以独蒙怜爱.

sentences.en: Old friends like to reminisce about the good old days.
sentences.cn: 老朋友们总喜欢谈论那“美好的往昔”.

sentences.en: One reason that paying for experiences gives us longer-lasting happiness is that we can reminisce about them, researchers say.
sentences.cn: 研究人员说，体验型消费之所以能产生持久幸福感，是因为我们可以经常回忆它们。

sentences.en: Reminisce some time, the night they took my friend.
sentences.cn: 有时候会想起, 朋友离去的那个夜晚.

sentences.en: Would you call old friends you never see, Reminisce of memories?
sentences.cn: 你会请来久年未见的老友一起叙旧么?

sentences.en: Your actions now create memories you reminisce and talk about in your elder years.
sentences.cn: 现在的作为制造着记忆,用来提供给人生暮年怀念和谈论的记忆.

sentences.en: Your actions now create memories you will reminisce and talk about in your elder years.
sentences.cn: 你现在所做的一切都会成为将来的回忆和年老时的谈资.

words.tran_cn: 怀旧的，回忆往事的；耽于回想的
回忆；怀旧；引起联想的相似事物
